column4: if there are 4 instances of myself logged in (as reported by the 'users' command), how do i log out the other 3 instances?
pumpernickle, when i type 'users' from a terminal, it lists my user id 4 times, and when i type 'uptime' from a terminal, it says 4 users are logged in
pumpernickle, is there a better way to see who is logged in?
Why not reboot?  Then check for additional users after rebooting.
